basic.description: This course has a recommended background of two years of high school algebra. Topics include financial mathematics; linear and exponential growth; numbers and number systems; history of mathematics; elementary number theory; voting techniques; graph theory; game theory; geometry; and computer  applications.
basic.subject: MGF
basic.title: Topics in Practical Finite Mathematics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MAT 1033 with a grade of "C-" or better or a suitable mathematics examination placement score. Recommended background: Two years of high school algebra.
